title: Frequently Asked Questions
q1: Is this an official Megadeth site?
a1: No, this is an unofficial fan site dedicated to Megadeth.
q2: Where can I find tour dates?
a2: Tour dates are updated in the 'Tour' section and on the homepage.
q3: How can I contact the site team?
a3: You can use the contact form or email megadethargentina77@gmail.com.
